patthana15.61:1.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:1.1_1: Nasukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:1.1_2: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:2.1_0: Sukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:2.1_1: Nasukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.61:2.1_2: Sukhasahagataṁ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
